name: 6u1n-Xu Protocol
description:
Controls: Arrow Keys - Attack (S, X or left clic) - Dodge (D, C or right clic) - Joysticks are supported

Credits:

  • Code: a lot was adapted from this very recommended GMS2 tutorial to Godot
  • Music: celestialghost8, Xenocity , H3LL0 FR0M TH3 FUTUR3 by Girliearchy
  • Visuals: Animated Rogue by Calciumtrice, zBoggler, Master484
  • Sound: yd, David McKee (ViRiX)
